channel.title: [Release] MikeRSWeb V4.5 [8/6/2009]
channel.description:
[B][CENTER]Yes, The moment we have been waiting for is finally here! MikeRSWeb V4.5! Its available for download and the New official MikeRSWeb Website. [url=http://mikersweb.info/]www.mikersweb.info[/url] This is also a live demo What changed?
[code] - The redirect to the index page has been changed to the correct file - Deletenews.php and Deletestaff.php have been fixed so that only users with the correct permission can use it. - The server status has been fixed - The link of the MikeRSWeb page has been updated. [/code]
For any questions, add [email]mikelmao@oghw.net[/email] to msn![/CENTER][/B] [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] No advertising your website without moderator permission.[/center]

item.title: [Release] MikeRSWeb V4.5 [8/6/2009]
item.dc:creator: @PeeHPee PeeHPee
item.description:
@PeeHPee wrote:

[quote=“eczema3, post:9, topic:282884”][quote author=PeeHPee link=topic=373802.msg2820361#msg2820361 date=1244567250]

Where do I put this in client.java?

public void boolean process();
[/quote]
I get errors when I compile ??

Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]
yeah you gotta import IpCheck.java to server.java

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] MikeRSWeb V4.5 [8/6/2009]
item.dc:creator: @mikelmao mikelmao
item.description:
@mikelmao wrote:

[B][CENTER]Yes, The moment we have been waiting for is finally here!
MikeRSWeb V4.5! Its available for download and the New official MikeRSWeb Website.
www.mikersweb.info This is also a live demo
What changed?

- The redirect to the index page has been changed to the correct file
- Deletenews.php and Deletestaff.php have been fixed so that only users with the correct permission can use it.
- The server status has been fixed
- The link of the MikeRSWeb page has been updated.

For any questions, add mikelmao@oghw.net to msn![/CENTER][/B]
[center] No advertising your website without moderator permission.[/center]

Read full topic
